snippet.title: Deceive Inc. New Agent: Octo Trailer
snippet.description:
Developer Sweet Bandits Studios and publisher Tripwire Presents announced the release of the DECEIVE INC. Of Queens & Kings update. Available today, for PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store), the PlayStation®5 computer entertainment system, and the Xbox Series X|S console systems, the third major post-launch content update for the game has agents hitting the catwalk. The new update introduces private lobbies, one of the most highly requested features from the player community, an all-new Spy, and the Seasonal Catalog 3, packed with new high-fashion cosmetics and other improvements for the stealth action title. 

To celebrate the launch of the Of Queens & Kings update, new players can sneak into the action by taking advantage of a limited time 50% discount for DECEIVE INC. available on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store).
